description: Try our easy to follow Roast Cauliflower recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Roast Cauliflower Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Bake for 5060 minutes or until tender. Cool for 10 minutes before cutting into wedges. Serve.
